// src/pages/HomePage.jsx import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; export default function HomePage() { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Join modal const [joinOpen, setJoinOpen] = useState(false); const [joinCode, setJoinCode] = useState(""); const [joinError, setJoinError] = useState(""); // Feedback modal const [feedbackOpen, setFeedbackOpen] = useState(false); const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", email: "", feedback: "" }); const [status, setStatus] = useState("SEND"); const timerRef = useRef(null); const handleCreate = () => navigate("/create"); const openJoin = () => { setJoinError(""); setJoinCode(""); setJoinOpen(true); }; const handleJoinSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const code = (joinCode || "").trim(); if (!code) { setJoinError("Please enter a room code"); return; } // close modal and navigate setJoinOpen(false); navigate(`/${encodeURIComponent(code)}`); }; const handleFeedbackSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (timerRef.current) clearTimeout(timerRef.current); setStatus("Sending..."); try { await axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER}/feedback/`, { data: form }); setForm({ name: "", email: "", feedback: "" }); setStatus("Sent!"); } catch (err) { console.error("Feedback failed", err); setStatus("Failed"); } timerRef.current = setTimeout(() => setStatus("SEND"), 4000); }; return (
